physDesc.p: Gebang leaves, measuring 37.5 × 3.6 cm, brown wooden box, 23 folios, four lines. The manuscript is from Cilegon, Tarogong District, Garut (Krom 1914:72). The manuscript was copied in the village Mahapavitra (unidentified), on the western slope of a place called Kaləpasən.

The manuscript consists of 41 gebang leaves, each measuring 22.6 × 4 cm, stored in a red wooden box, four lines per folio. The manuscript is from Tarogong, Garut (ROD 1914: 71). The pages are numbered 1–40 by the copyist, but there are some number- ing errors: 0 instead of 10 (fol. 11v), 6 instead of 16 (fol. 17v), 10 instead of 20, 30 instead of 40. In addition, among these 40 pages, there is no page 33; after page 16 the manuscript jumps to 19, back to number 17, then 18. However, the text is coherent in this arrangement.

div.p:
kurvanti katayan dharma, gavayakna sakagavayan saṅ hyaṅ dharma, lvirnya ta nihan, dāna, śīla, kṣānti, vīrya, dhyāna, prajñā, karuṇā, mudita, metrī, upekṣā, ka, dāna ṅaranya, mere enak ambək di paḍanya janma, śīla, ṅa, vihikan aṅalap kasor, kṣānti, ṅa, vi
hikan anupakṣama, vīrya, ṅa, utsāha ri kagavayaniṅ hayu, tambəhana hayunya muvah, dhyāna, ṅa, umiṅətakən arthaniṅ paramārtha, prajñā, ṅa, utsāha ri kahilaṅaniṅ daśakleśa ri śarīranya, karuṇā, ṅa, larāmbəknyāmaṅguhakən duhkhaniṅ len, mudita, ṅa, tar kepvan masukhaniṅ len, metrī, ṅa, vruh gumavayakna mimitiniṅ dadi inak ambhəknikaṅ len, upekṣā, ṅa, tar grah iri hala hayu.

div.head: Ten Grounds (daśabhūmi)
div.p:
kurvanti kuśalam mahat, gavayakna kaṅ kuśala viśeṣa, kuśala viśeṣa, ṅa, asih bhakti prayatna, gorava duga-du
ga, śānta karuṇa ika, anumāna, anumoda, ālambana atvaṅ, ya sinaṅguh daśabhūmi, ṅa, abhyāsa lagi-lagi saṅ paṇḍita, ikaṅ ambək maṅkana.

div.head: Origins of Sorrow
div.p: ndah nihan kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma, marapvan tar knaniṅ upadrava jagat gatisaṅsāra, hana paśānta, śabda paśānta, ulah paśānta, ambək paśānta, ya rakṣa pahayu juga, marapvan tar kna saṅka ri duhkha, kaliṅanya, duhkha saṅka ri bhuta, duhkha saṅka ri devata, duhkha saṅka ri śarīra.

ka, yan kita kəna ku na upadrava, ku na pañcamahabuta, pati disantok oray, dipanah gəlap, disaṅgu
t buhaya, katiṅgaṅ paṅpuṅ, dirontok mauṅ, pati dipraṅ, dihadaṅ, dipuak, pati labuh ti na luhur kai, ditumpu, pati dikəndat, sakvehniṅ bajra pati di praṅan, ya duka saṅka ri buta, ṅa, ya duka saṅka ri devata ma, ṅa, tajam səkət, nirisan, riət hulu, sakit mata, jaroṅən, sumbilaṅən, buyan, mədu, panas tiris, larahati, ya duka saṅka ri deva, ṅa, ya duka saṅka riṅ sarira ma pecak, beṅo, buntuṅ, buta tuli, beaṅ, rumpuṅ tugəl, ya duka sarira, ṅa, ya duka ku na tribvana ma, ṅa, hulun, pahuma,
pañadap, pañavah, mava taṅan, dipisuku, dipitaṅan, mo visesa di huripnya, di bənaṅnya, di gunanya, ya duka ku na tribvana, ṅa, ya duka ku na bvanaloka ma, ṅa, kahuruan dayəh, buruṅ tahun, eleh dayəh, eleh ku sasalad, laru salah masa, sarba satva ñarak, sarba pala tan pavvaḥ, ya duka saṅka ri bvanaloka, ṅa.

mana duka ku ulahta, ku sabdata, ku ambəkta, ṅahanakən ulah dusta, sabda dusta, ambək dusta, mapa ta kaliṅaniṅ sabda dusta, ñumpah-madahkən, ṅajap, ṅapus, mariṅkavut, ṅadu
duh, nəluh, ṅupat, naruh, campəlak sabda, gasoṅ tan pakarana, ya sabda dusta, ṅa, ulah dusta, ṅa, nampar, mərəp, ṅadədəl, nəvək, mokol, sakvehniṅ ləkas taṅan, ya ulah dusta, ṅa, ambək dusta, ṅa, ṅaracun, mijahətan, hiri payogya, di padanya janma, ya ambək dusta, ṅa, ya saṅkaniṅ duka ku ulahta, ku sabdata, ku ambəkta.

kita yan avədi ri upadrava, ulahakən śabda paśānta, ṅa, ulah paśānta, ambək paśānta, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma, marapvan tar vinigraha, śabda paśānta, ṅa, śabda menak, śabda rahayu, śabda
manohara, śabda madhura, śabda manis arum, ya śabda paśānta, ṅa, ulah paśānta, ṅa, ulah menak, ulah rahayu, hayva palar cidra, hayva sraṅ ulah hala hayu, taṅan masaṅguli, matalaṅkup, yan paṅucap lavan vvaṅ atuha, ya ulah paśānta, ṅa, ambək paśānta, ṅa, hayva daṇḍakara, hiri payvagya, ri paḍanya janma, hayva jahət ambək, ṅahanakən ambək menak, ambək heraṅ, ambek rahayu, ya ambək paśānta, ṅa, ya karasa ikaṅ paśānta, kahanakən sakāya-kāyeka dharma, ya tar karasa i
rikaṅ paśānta, ambək duṣṭa maṅkana, nihan śikṣā saṅ paṇḍita, śikṣā guru, ṅa, ya ta mataṅyan kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma.

div.ab: L 642: Iti siksa guru, ṅa, lamun vruh di vvitniṅ bənər tar kəna ku upaḍrava, lamun tar vruh di vvitniṅ bənər, kəna ku na upadrava, nihan kavuvusan siksa guru, ṅa, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma.

L 633: Itiḥ sikṣa saṁ pandita, nihan ṣikṣa guru ṅaranya, yan mataṁṅyan kayatnakna saṁ sevaka darma, tman·,, tlas· tinulis· ri kasapuluḥ, Uvusan· purnama tiL̥m·, malam·paḥ hiṁṅampura saṅ amaca, puna tapak taṁṅan pukulun· rocek lvater pukulun, bənaṁ diAjar di desa sunya pun·.
